      • endGame

        public static boolean endGame()
        Ends the current game and display's the current scoreboard
        Returns:
        True if the player wants to play again, false otherwise

      • reset

        Resets the current score

      • hasNewHighScore

        private static int hasNewHighScore()
        Check if the player has a new high score and, if needed, moves the current scoreboard players to make space
        Returns:
        The index where the new player will be added

        private static void nextLevel()
        Updates the level
